Uses of Class
it.polimi.ingsw.network.objects.NetGameSetup

Packages that use NetGameSetup 
Package Description
it.polimi.ingsw.controller  
it.polimi.ingsw.core  
it.polimi.ingsw.network  
it.polimi.ingsw.ui

it.polimi.ingsw.ui.gui.controller  
it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers  

  • Uses of NetGameSetup in it.polimi.ingsw.controller

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.controller with parameters of type NetGameSetup 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void SetupManager.positionWorkers​(NetGameSetup positions)
    This method handles the request of positioning the workers of the player on the map, it can be completed only if cells are free and if the player is the active player.
    void ServerController.updatePositions​(ObservableObject observed, NetGameSetup netObject)
    This method receives a request from a client through its RemoteView and analyze if it's the player's turn and if it is the correct phase (the positioning workers on game map phase), if this conditions are all true then the method calls the SetupManager, otherwise it calls the error handling method of the RemoteView.

  • Uses of NetGameSetup in it.polimi.ingsw.core

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.core with parameters of type NetGameSetup 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Game.setWorkerPositions​(NetGameSetup req)
    Sets the player's workers on the game map if the cells specified are free.

  • Uses of NetGameSetup in it.polimi.ingsw.network

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.network with parameters of type NetGameSetup 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void RemoteView.handlePositionRequest​(NetGameSetup req, boolean error)
    It receives a well formed request of positioning of workers, when with well formed we mean that the position is inside the map.
    private void ClientMessageListener.parseGameSetupInput​(NetGameSetup msg)
    This method parses the game setup messages sending to the controller and it changes the network phase if a specific message arrives.
    private void ServerClientListenerThread.parseGameSetupInput​(NetGameSetup gameSetupMessage)
    This function parses the input that arrives from the client in the game setup phase, in this phase the player can send its workers position on the game table or disconnect, if the message id well formed it is sent to the RemoteView handling method.

  • Uses of NetGameSetup in it.polimi.ingsw.ui

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.ui with parameters of type NetGameSetup 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void GraphicInterface.retrieveGameSetupMsg​(NetGameSetup gameSetupMsg)
    When this method is called a message must be processed by the client, the message will be sent to a queue to wait to be read.

  • Uses of NetGameSetup in it.polimi.ingsw.ui.cli.controller

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.ui.cli.controller with parameters of type NetGameSetup 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void MainCliController.retrieveGameSetupMsg​(NetGameSetup gameSetupMsg)
    It receives asynchronous or synchronous messages from the network component that there was an error on the message sent or the message about.

  • Uses of NetGameSetup in it.polimi.ingsw.ui.gui.controller

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.ui.gui.controller with parameters of type NetGameSetup 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void MainGuiController.retrieveGameSetupMsg​(NetGameSetup gameSetupMsg)
    The message is sent to the current JavaFX scene to change it or handle changes.

  • Uses of NetGameSetup in it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers with parameters of type NetGameSetup 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void ObservableRemoteView.notifyPositions​(NetGameSetup netMap)
    This method notifies the ObserverController about the message sent by the user during worker positioning phase.
    void ObserverController.updatePositions​(ObservableObject observed, NetGameSetup netObject)
    Updates the observer when the observer calls this method because a player wants to position its worker on the game table.
